name: todo-tree
description: Show TODO, FIXME, etc. comment tags in a tree view

view/title.when: view =~ /todo-tree/ && todo-tree-flat == false && todo-tree-tags-only == false && todo-tree-show-view-style-button == true
view =~ /todo-tree/ && todo-tree-flat == true && todo-tree-tags-only == false && todo-tree-show-view-style-button == true
view =~ /todo-tree/ && todo-tree-flat == false && todo-tree-tags-only == true && todo-tree-show-view-style-button == true
view =~ /todo-tree/ && todo-tree-grouped-by-sub-tag == false && todo-tree-show-group-by-sub-tag-button == true && todo-tree-has-sub-tags == true
view =~ /todo-tree/ && todo-tree-grouped-by-sub-tag == true && todo-tree-show-group-by-sub-tag-button == true && todo-tree-has-sub-tags == true
